msbt.message: Just wanted to thank you for flying Dodo Airlines! We know you don't have a lot of options, but thanks for choosing us all the same. We hope you enjoy this bit of custom DAL merch! Nifty, right?

Thank you for using Dodo Airlines. Enclosed, please find the prize you received from Rover during your May Day Tour. And if you're ever at a loss, remember to ask yourself, "What would dodos do?"
Thanks for choosing Dodo Airlines, the only way to fly! Enclosed, please find any Bell vouchers we held for you during your recent May Day Tour.
